content: @pnkfelix, maybe others, I'm documenting a bit better the procedure we follow on WG prioritization
I don't remember very well what do we do with rejected backports
when we accept a backport a beta-accepted or stable-accepted label is added
but when we reject, we just remove the beta-nomination or stable-nomination label?
i believe we remove the nomination in that case
and of course include a comment with either (or both of): 1. justification for declining, and/or 2. a link to the meeting where it was discussed.
yeah the nomination label should be removed
for stable noms I drop both nom and acceptance if we're not planning to make a point release in a given cycle usually (e.g., I just did that for one PR today I think)
